title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.44 - Retention and updating of old forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.44 - Retention and updating of old forms

State Regulations
(a) The employer must save his or her copies
of the SH 900 and, to the extent used as an illness and injury report, C2, forms for five years following the year to which they relate and continue to
provide access to the data as required in the Part. The employer is not
required to update old DOSH 900 and C2 forms. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
801.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
